2:
--------------------
Text: Hun Hunahpu:  He is also stated to be the father of the twins' half-brothers, the patrons of the artisans and writers, Hun-Chowen and Hun-Batz (see Howler monkey gods).
Triplets:<Hun Hunahpu
3:
--------------------
Text: Hun Hunahpu:  Head-Apu I is paired with his brother, Vucub-Hunahpu 'Head-Apu VII'.
Triplets:<Hun Hunahpu
